snippet: Ellsworth Kelly chose and installed every work in the exhibit “Monet/Kelly” at Clark Art Institute. The abstractionist and the impressionist unexpectedly make a logical match.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews works by Claude Monet and Ellsworth Kelly at the Clark Art Institute in Williamstown, Mass.
lead_paragraph: Ellsworth Kelly chose and installed every work in the exhibit “Monet/Kelly” at Clark Art Institute. The abstractionist and the impressionist unexpectedly make a logical match.

headline.print_headline: When an Abstract Artist Falls in Love With Monet
headline.seo: ‘Monet/Kelly’ at Clark Art Institute, Ellsworth Kelly Falls for Monet
headline.main: When an Abstract Artist Falls in Love With Monet
